snippet.title: Centum - Official Release Window Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Every why has a wherefore. You are trapped, and you must escape. But is that really the goal? Centum is an unreliable narrative-driven adventure where everything may be a lie. Watch the latest Centum trailer for another look at the creepy world and a release window reveal. Centum will be available in 2025 on Xbox and Steam.
